item.title: github: Copilot usage metrics now includes enterprise-level GitHub Copilot CLI activity
item.description:
GitHub Copilot enterprise usage metrics now include GitHub Copilot CLI telemetry, expanding whatâ€™s counted in enterprise-level reporting.

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Reporting in Playwright Workspaces (part of Azure App Testing)
item.description:
Azure App Testing has made reporting in Playwright Workspaces generally available, delivering an integrated, flexible and collaborative reporting experience to help teams debug Playwright tests more quickly and efficiently.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Track organization Copilot usage
item.description:
GitHub announced Copilot usage APIs that let organizations retrieve aggregated and user-specific usage metrics, including statistics for different Copilot features, to monitor adoption and consumption.

  • Source: GitHub
